42.1. [Remigius of Auxerre] Expositio in Genesim.
Exposition | Genesis
Manuscripts:
Family alpha
1. Vatican, Biblioteca Apostolica lat. 646, f. 1r-82v. saec. ix ex - saec. x inc. O: north of Auxerre, perhaps Reims; P: Burgundy, St. Vivant. (S) *
2. Rimini, Biblioteca Civica Gambalunga SC-385, f. 1r-24v. saec. xviii. O-P: Cardinal Garempi.*
3. Troyes, Bibliothèque municipale 387, f. 1r-27v. saec. x ex.-xi inc. O: France; P: Dijon, St. Bénigne, Bouhier. (S) *
4. Berlin, Staatsbibliothek - Preussischer Kulturbesitz theol. lat. qu. 299. saec. xii. Pontigny. (S)*
5. Toulouse, Bibliothèque municipale 160, f. 1v-50r. saec. xi. (S) *
Family gamma
6. Barcelona, Archivo Capitular 64, f. 1va-27vb. saec. x2. O: Catalonia (?). *
7. Rome, Biblioteca Vallicelliana C.36, f. 1ra-14rb. saec. xii ex. P: S. Italy (?). (S) *
Family ß
8. Paris, Bibliothèque Mazarine 234, f. 50r-110v. saec. xi. P: Clunaic (?). (S) *
9. Avranches, Bibliothèque municipale 109, f. 1r-35r. saec. xii ex. O-P: Mont-Saint-Michel. *
10. Grenoble, Bibliothèque municipale 275 (347), f. 77ra-125vb. saec. xii. P: Notre Dame des Portes. *
11. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale lat. 9420, f. 73ra-98va. saec. xiv.*
St. Peters, Salzburg, cat. (saec. xii): 144 Remigius super Genesim, item Angelomus diaconus in Genesim.
